summary: REQ-98 (II button becomes Logout and calls clear() with local state reset) appears implemented in InternalLogin.tsx. REQ-97â€™s UI gating for the Claim Superadmin section is indicated by the summary text (gated behind !!actor && !actorFetching), but the patch violates the constraint/AC that only InternalLogin.tsx be modified because two additional non-requested files were also modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other pages or files are modified (modify only `frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogin.tsx` for this patch).

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrained the patch to modify only `frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogin.tsx` and not change other frontend files; these edits are not requested by REQ-97/REQ-98.
